name: PE with EBacc
interviewProcess:
Due to COVID restrictions we are currently unable to observe anyone teach within our schools and so have changed our interview process as follows.

ID and qualifications check
Observational task; watching a short video and answering a few questions – 20 mins
Literacy task; Correcting a piece of text and answering a few questions – 30 mins
Oral presentation; stating three reasons what influenced you to become a teacher – 10 mins
Formal Interview;  – 30 mins
howSchoolPlacementsWork: Trainees are involved in the decision making process when choosing a main placement school. We endeavour to place trainees in one of their first three choices of schools. The Coventry SCITT organises your second placement for you to ensure you have the opportunity to teach in a contextually different school.
